channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Disable User Login
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Disable User Login

item.title: CVE-2022-2350|2024-08-03T00:32:09.701Z -- unknown -- disable%20user%20login
item.description: The Disable User Login WordPress plugin through 1.0.1 does not have authorisation and CSRF checks when updating its settings, allowing unauthenticated attackers to block (or unblock) users at will.
